content: If a person consumes an average of 2000 calories per day, how many calories will they consume in a month with 30 days?

If a person consumes an average of 2000 calories per day, then in a month with 30 days, they would consume:

2000 calories/day × 30 days = 60,000 calories

So, they would consume 60,000 calories in that month.
